this is a portfolio website that will be hosted on GitHub Pages. It consists of the Home section at the very top and followed by project highlights that the user can scroll through
the main section consists of the parts described in @.github/instructions/home.instructions.md
the reference for what the home section should look like is in references/home.png. the logo png is in images/logo.png, and the "file" icon that every project entry can use in the list is in images/file-alt.png
